name: Simplest RPG - Online Edition
description:
Enjoy Simplest RPG Online Edition - Fight monsters, complete quests, upgrade items, defeat other players and have fun!

• Free-to-play friendly, all players can obtain the best gear with earned in-game gold
• Defeat other players!
• Fight dozens of different monsters!
• Complete quick tasks!
• Explore the ruins to find gold and rare items
• Upgrade your items to be game master.
• Beautiful graphics
• Looks great on low-end and high-end devices
• Simple text RPG adventure story
• The game is free of ads!
• Unlock all achievements
• Compete with friends

Please, enjoy it and have fun!
If you have any advice to improve our games, feel free and let us know.
It would be very appreciated.
Also, if there are bugs, let us know. We'll fix it as soon as possible.

Join our discord to be part of an active online community
https://discord.gg/xBpYSgr

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SimplestRPG
